All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptsCalibrePlugin
    Represents an object which accepts a plugin field of type CalibrePlugin.
    AcceptsCalibrePluginAdapter
    Type adapter for providing AcceptsCalibrePlugin with plugin fields during deserialization.
    Blueprint
    Represents a premade structure of components.
    BlueprintCreationException  
    CalibreCommand
    The plugin's command handler.
    CalibreComponent
    A component, which can be nested to create component trees.
    CalibreComponentAdapter  
    CalibreComponentSlot
    A slot which can hold a CalibreComponent.
    CalibreCoreHook
    The core CalibreHook.
    CalibreHook
    A hook onto CalibrePlugin which can modify things at enable-time.
    CalibreIdentifiable
    A tag interface for a generic Calibre object which: has an ID must be validated on load
    CalibreItem
    A tag interface for a generic Calibre object which: has an ID must be validated on load can be converted to an ItemStack accepts a CalibrePlugin
    CalibrePlayer
    Wrapper around Player for storing Calibre's data.
    CalibrePlugin
    The main plugin class.
    CalibreSystem
    A system that can interact with a CalibreComponent through: Running code on event calls (right click, hold, etc.) Accepting custom data on deserialization Providing stat definitions
    ComponentCreationException  
    ComponentDescriptor
    Can create a CalibreComponent if provided with a Registry.
    ComponentDescriptorAdapter  
    EventHandle  
    ItemDescriptor
    A description of an ItemStack.
    RegistryCommandContext<T extends me.aecsocket.unifiedframework.registry.Identifiable>  
    TestSystem
